text: Thomas Christian Südhof (born December 22, 1955),ForMemRS, is a German- American biochemist. He is known for his study of synaptic transmission. Südhof, James Rothman and Randy Schekman won the 2013 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for their work on vesicle trafficking. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:German biochemists Category:American biochemists
title: Thomas C. Südhof
